summary: This is a mod that lets you create unenchanted, armored Expert and Master Robes at the forge.
descriptionHtml:
This is a mod that lets you create unenchanted, armored Expert and Master Robes at the forge.
The armor is equal to the Glass armors, and to craft it you have to have [b]Arcane Blacksmith [/b]or [b]Arcane Artisan[/b] perk from the Smithing tree
Materials used are pretty easy to get, but still require a bit of work to acquire

This is made because I think the robes look good on a ranger-type character that still has to be lightly armored.
It uses the vanilla meshes and texture, so would have no incompatibility issues unless you have mods that alters the robes already running on your load order. Mind you this also changes the other Expert and Master Robes e.g. Destruction, Restoration etc into armored version.

Mods featured on screens:

[color=#e69138][size=4]UPDATE
[/size][/color]Added recipes for other Expert and Master Robes (Alteration, Conjuration, Destruction, Illusion, Magicka Regen and Restoration

Enjoy
author: vallenvega
